Yoko.is

Hay! My name is Yoko.

I live in Brooklyn and work at Etsy as a product designer. I co-host a podcast called So Where Are You From?. When I’m not doing either of those things, I’m probably dancing, exploring, or internetting. I like pandas.

Instead of using social media, I am considering sending out life updates via email. If you’re interested, you can sign up here. In the meantime, I still post on Instagram.

Yoko Sakao Ohama (she/her) makes this site with Jekyll and runs it on Github Pages.

@yokogoesplorin (Neat stuff I find around the webs)
@psyoko_ebooks (My bot Twitter account, lol)
